class_notes: Section #1 is for MN Semester 4 students only.
course_description: Students will synthesize and apply new and existing knowledge from nursing and related sciences to manage patients with complex care needs. Focus will be on interprofessional collaboration, leadership and high quality patient and family-centered care during acute health crises and transitions.
sections: Class Nbr: 3468, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: ThF 8:30-9:50a, Instructor: Reilly/Frenkel, Status: Open
